metadata.title: CVE-2020-14409 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS. (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
SDL (Simple DirectMedia Layer) through 2.0.12 has an Integer Overflow (andresultant SDL_memcpy heap corruption) in SDL_BlitCopy invideo/SDL_blit_copy.c via a crafted .BMP file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-14409` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libsdl2-2.0-0 - 2.0.14+dfsg2-3
libsdl2-tests - 2.0.14+dfsg2-3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libsdl2 package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.0.14+dfsg2-3').
